about_the_game:
This is a digital art book of Black Witchcraft.

The file is provided in PNG format.
It has been translated into Korean, Japanese, English, and Chinese (simplified and traditional).

The digital art book contains detailed descriptions of each character and
It contains descriptions and more.

Please note that some spoilers are included.
The description of the enemies is also included, so after playing the game
Please watch it slowly and get closer to the worldview of Black Witchcraft.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 64bit
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
